TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

span.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このクラスに書き込むのためのメソッドもあります、を[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]パッケージ、読み取り、から、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)]を表す文字列が指定されたパッケージ、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]のします。This class also has methods for writing a to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and reading a from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package that is given a string that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the . 基本クラスを参照してください。と重要な使用法をします。See the base classes and for important usage notes.
